list.description:
Acquire your foes with style with this modification of @KurumiShiramine 's MBT sight with the iconic DOOM HUD! 😎

The zip file has the JSON to modify the position, scale or add new lines and shapes into the sight (the DOOM hud) in this website called WTdraw:
https://solawk.github.io/wtdraw/

Best used for tanks with a two-plane stabilizer and with laser rangefinder for high tier tank engagements.

#universal #alltanks #all_tanks #doom #mbt #sight #sights

Sight Idea: Knuttersmen
Source: Rem [Re:Zero]

Open 4 Sights Commissions, If you want to Request a Commission Reach out to b.prod on Discord

This is a SFW Sight! [Safe-For-Work]

Installation Guide

1) Unzip The Sight Zip File into your main Sights folder.

[Location should be \WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks]

2) Note that after You install a sight you need to Reboot/Restart the game

3) Go to test drive and go in sight settings in OPTIONS (find the sight and save it)

4) Once in test drive, press F9 to update sights (it might...

This is my first time making a gun sight so sorry if it looks a bit janky

THIS CAN WORK FOR ALL TANKS

HOW TO INSTAL

1) Install the sight

2) Go to the War Thunder folder and click "User Sights"

3) Make a file and name it "all_tanks"
